§8§o§o§rSteam cracking is a form of §cthermal cracking §rthat allows you to produce alkenes such as ethylene, propylene, etc. from lighter fractions and molecules such as naphtha.

Additionally, pyrolysis gasoline can be used as a gasoline blending component or as a source of §l§l§r§6BTEX§r.
